title: Finally,the Riven Nerfs
body:
I hope this champion will suffer as much as my baby Azir. ====)))
http://www.rawstory.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Man-laughing-at-computer-Shutterstock.jpg

replies.body: it isn't even a nerf really lmfao
hopefully it's the beginning to one =)

> [{quoted}](name=Kichitsu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9Ew4T4Qb,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-10-01T04:11:28.498+0000)
>
> hopefully it's the beginning to one =)

i don't even see what's so bad about riven

yes her kit is annoying to fight against, but you can still compete, unlike other champions who make competing very difficult
what are those other champions

> [{quoted}](name=Kichitsu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9Ew4T4Qb,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-01T04:16:16.288+0000)
>
> what are those other champions

{{champion:1}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:90}} 

must i go on?

> [{quoted}](name=Bleediss,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9Ew4T4Qb,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-01T06:05:54.761+0000)

you forgot vlad, bro. How could you forget the king of low-interaction, bullshit gameplay.

vlad actually has such a shitty early game it can be abused upon and turn him into dogshit later on

> [{quoted}](name=Bleediss,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9Ew4T4Qb,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-01T07:18:25.136+0000)
>
> vlad actually has such a shitty early game it can be abused upon and turn him into dogshit later on

If he does, than I never see it. His damage always outpaces mine and because he's a fucking mage, he outranges me 8/10 times.

> [{quoted}](name=Metarid,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9Ew4T4Qb,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2015-10-01T17:41:16.933+0000)
>
> If he does, than I never see it. His damage always outpaces mine and because he's a fucking mage, he outranges me 8/10 times.

You must have the worst pick against him then: immobile tank.

> [{quoted}](name=Bleediss,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9Ew4T4Qb,comment-id=000100000000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2015-10-01T21:21:32.475+0000)
>

Even as someone like Fiora he's a colossal pain in the ass.

> [{quoted}](name=Metarid,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9Ew4T4Qb,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2015-10-01T22:26:29.990+0000)
>
> Even as someone like Fiora he's a colossal pain in the ass.

Not really, Vlad struggles against anyone who has a gap closer, damage, and stickiness through their kit, Fiora should be a hard counter in reality.

> [{quoted}](name=Bleediss,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9Ew4T4Qb,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-01T22:40:50.754+0000)
>
> Not really, Vlad struggles against anyone who has a gap closer, damage, and stickiness through their kit, Fiora should be a hard counter in reality.

In reality, but in practicality, vlad's ability to spam transfusion is annoying as fuck. I was able to beat him only after lane phase had ended, I was forced to buy a spirit cowl, mercs, AND maw of malmortius in order to survive his attacks.

> [{quoted}](name=Metarid,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9Ew4T4Qb,comment-id=000100000000000000000000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-01T23:49:30.489+0000)
>
> In reality, but in practicality, vlad's ability to spam transfusion is annoying as fuck. I was able to beat him only after lane phase had ended, I was forced to buy a spirit cowl, mercs, AND maw of malmortius in order to survive his attacks.

then you must not be very good at abusing your advantage

because vlad's sustain may be annoying, but he's really easy to deal with once you kill him in lane

> [{quoted}](name=Bleediss,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9Ew4T4Qb,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-02T00:27:35.485+0000)
>
> then you must not be very good at abusing your advantage
> 
> because vlad's sustain may be annoying, but he's really easy to deal with once you kill him in lane

Except I didn't get much of an advantage, he killed me in lane thanks to a very timely battery death in my mouse.
explain how i went bot with a support and got 2 kills in the first 3 mins then and then carried my team? {{champion:8}}  kneel before vlad

{{champion:8}} at least requires health as a cost. Riven is costless. 

But I still agree that shes not as scary as she used to be only because other champions are being revamped to match her own kit which was light-years ahead of nearly any other champ in lol.
This is even more proof that 99% of Riven whiners know jack shit about her, and just want her pretty much deleted.

> [{quoted}](name=Kichitsu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9Ew4T4Qb,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-10-01T03:56:56.975+0000)
>
> I hope this champion will suffer as much as my baby Azir. ====)))
> http://www.rawstory.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Man-laughing-at-computer-Shutterstock.jpg

How is this a nerf? Can't you read?

Riven only lost her ability to snipe someone whenever she wants. She has to have full edge to get old execute value.
And her passive is the same except it generates Edge when she procs it with her auto attack.
And when she has full edge, she deals 10% more damage across all abilities and auto attacks.

Also she loses Edge stacks when she hasn't attacked enemy champions for 10 seconds. I repeat, when she hasn't procced her passive on ENEMY CHAMPIONS. This buff simply expires.

Learn to read notes, fool.
[On the design direction of the experimental Riven changes](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/nP3Ln4d0-the-design-direction-of-the-experimental-riven-changes?comment=0001)

Just seems a nerf to the Ult for the early game, I haven't seen the numbers, but it might do around the same damage at full edge stacks. As for the Passive.. if the AA cancelling remains, it looks like it will still do decent damage. Her other skills haven't been touched.
